price: Kuma bã dõmin wata kalma ba wadda ta gabãta daga Ubangijinka, da kuma ajali ambatacce haƙĩƙa, dã azãbarta kasance mai lazimta.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَكَانَ لِزَامٗا وَأَجَلٞ مُّسَمّٗى

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika lakāna lizāman wa-ajalun musamman
